summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2019, regarding the Epstein matter. A Special Agent in Charge from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office is attempting to coordinate interviews and requests a callback from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: Special Agent in Charge, DOJ Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: The sender of the email attempting to coordinate interviews regarding the Epstein matter. They are out of the office and request a callback.

events.title: Coordination of Epstein Interviews
events.description: A Special Agent in Charge from the DOJ OIG attempts to contact the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to discuss interviews planned for that day regarding the Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The communication occurred on August 12, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was actively involved in coordinating interviews related to the Epstein investigation at that time.
The email indicates ongoing investigative activity by federal authorities following Epstein's death.
